name: YAWS - Yet Another Wave Shooter
detailed_description: YAWS (Yet Another Waveshooter) is a waveshooter in three epochs (fantasy, present, and future). Defend yourself against never ending waves of enemies with increasing difficulty until you die. After death, you will be transported to the next level. Engage in an immersive experience with anit-motionsickness movement and gain the top score.
